Ingredients.1: 0.5 pound bacon, cut into 1/2 inch pieces

Ingredients.5: 2 (6.5 ounce) cans chopped clams, drained with juice reserved

Ingredients.7: 2 (1.8 ounce) packages dry leek soup mix

Directions.1: Cook bacon in a large pot over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until crisped and browned, about 10 minutes. Transfer bacon with a slotted spoon to a paper towel-lined plate. Leave drippings in the pot.

Directions.2: Place potatoes and carrots into the pot and season with salt and pepper; cook in bacon drippings, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes.

Directions.3: Pour clam juice into the pot, add enough water to just cover potatoes, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until potatoes are just tender, 10 to 15 minutes.

Directions.4: Add leek soup mix and gently stir until no lumps remain. Stir in clams, half-and-half, and reserved bacon. Cook and stir until chowder returns to a simmer and thickens, about 10 minutes more.
